bike.description: S-Works Stumpjumper FSR FACT IS 10M carbon main triangle and seatstays with carbon drive dropout, M5 alloy chainstays, full cartridge bearing pivots, 140mm travel

components.description: Specialized/Fox AFR Brain Shock w/ remote Trail Tune inertia valve, rebound adj. and Brain Fade, 7.875x1.9" Integrated cartridge bearing shock mount.
1-1/8 - 1 1/2" Threadless, Campy style upper and lower cartridge bearing for tapered HT and steer
Shimano M971 XTR, DMD, top swing, dual pull
S-Works Carbon, 30.9mm, single-bolt head, S/M: 350mm, L/XL: 400mm
7050 hard annodized alloy collar w/ QR, 36.9mm clamp ID, for carbon frame
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, owners manual
